column4: ok, i wanna get dual screens working with _SEPARATE_ x-servers - I have an x-server on monitor2 but no XGL. How do i edit /etc/gdm/conf to make it work with XGL on the secondary
i already have the xorg.conf set up properly
lol, gaim makes funky colours of people's names
anyone wanna help with dual XGL?
the people at #nvidia and #ati are really helpful too
